inclusion.criterion: otherwise normal healthy adults aged 18 to 65
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known history of liver, kidney or hematological disease (other than G6PD deficiency)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: non-sinus rhythm arrhythmia or QT prolongation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and cardiomyopathy, but no other significant medical history.
